property.en: Summary. Display a summary of the Properties tab information.
property.zc: < p > < >强总结。显示属性选项卡信息的摘要

property.en:
Filters. Filter available properties.

  • Filter Property: Lists the available properties.
  • Operator: Lists the operations available for the above property.
  • Value(s): Allows you to input conditions for the operation.
  • Blank: Check the box to return results with the value or a blank (null).
  • Param: Check the box to allow users to modify the parameter from the report viewer.
property.zc:
< p > < >强过滤器。< / >强滤波器可用属性。

  • Filter Property:列出可用属性。
  • Operator:列出对上述属性可用的操作
  • Value(s):允许输入操作条件。
  • Blank:选中复选框返回有值或空(null)的结果。
  • Param:勾选允许用户从报表查看器修改参数的复选框。

property.en: Reports. View all existing reports, save a new report, and save an existing report with a new name.
property.zc: < p > <强>报告。查看所有已存在的报告，另存一个新的报告，并另存一个新的报告名称

property.en: Preview. View your report. Click on the column headings to sort in ascending or descending order.
property.zc: < p > <强>预览。< / >强查看报告。单击列标题以升序或降序排序。

property.en: Style. Set colors for the border, header, item and alternating item. Click Set Default to restore system defaults.
property.zc: < p > < >强劲的风格。设置边框，标题，项目和交替项目的颜色。单击Set Default恢复系统默认值

property.en: Item Types. First select the top level Item Type which will be used for the report. Once selected, you may select additional related Item Types as well as properties of the top level Item Type. Selections will be displayed in the Reporting Structure window.
property.zc: < p > < / p > < p > < >强类型的物品。首先选择用于报表的顶级项目类型。一旦选择，您可以选择其他相关的项目类型以及顶级项目类型的属性。选择将显示在报告结构窗口中

property.en:
Properties. Add and delete properties from your selected Item Types. Sort the properties and apply various functions, groupings, and styling.

  • ItemType: Item Type of the selected Property.
  • Property: Label of the selected Property.
  • Display Label: Display label of the Property. Defaults to the Property name, but can be edited.
  • Sort: Sort by the selected Property in ascending order.
  • VG: Visually groups the properties in your report.
  • A: Allows you to add, subtract, multiply, or divide by the selection in the row above.
  • Function: Allows you to perform a function on the selected Property.
  • Format: Allows you to format the selected Property.
  • Actions: Allows you to perform a number of advanced actions on the Property including styling, conditional formatting, and expression building.
property.zc:
< p > <强>属性。从您选择的项目类型中添加和删除属性。对属性进行排序，并应用各种函数、分组和样式。

  • ItemType:选中属性的项目类型。
  • Property:选定属性的标签。
  • Display Label:显示属性的标签。默认为属性名，但可以编辑。
  • Sort:按所选属性的升序排序。
  • VG:可视化地对报表中的属性进行分组。
  • A:允许您对上面一行所选内容进行加、减、乘或除操作。
  • Function:允许对选定的属性执行函数。
  • Format:允许您格式化选定的属性。
  • Actions:允许您在属性上执行一些高级操作，包括样式化、条件格式化和表达式构建

property.en: Chart. Select a Bar, Funnel, Pie, or Trend Chart to add to your report. Quickly create the chart by selecting the Label and Value along with the corresponding functions. Click the Advanced Properties button to set a number of additional properties relevant to the specific chart type.
property.zc: < p > <强>图表。选择一个Bar， 漏斗， Pie，或趋势图表添加到您的报告中。通过选择Label和Value以及相应的功能来快速创建图表。点击高级属性按钮来设置一些与特定图表类型相关的附加属性

property.en:
Misc. Add a title, description, header, and footer to the report.

Share Report. Reports can be shared to everyone (Public) or to a specific list of Identities (Aliases or Groups). A report can be shared with one of four options:

  • Full: Report is available to the user to view, modify, and save changes to the report.
  • Read Only: Report is available to the user to view, user can add or remove filters, and modify existing filters' values. Also user can modify (design) the report but cannot change the original design but can use Save As to create a copy.
  • View Only: Report is available to the user to view, but not to modify in any way or save changes to the report.
  • Locked: Report is available to the user to view, and user can modify existing filters' values, but user cannot add or remove or change filters or fields or save changes to the report.
property.zc:
< p > < >强混杂。为报表添加标题、描述、页眉和页脚。< / p > < p > < >强分享报告。报告可以共享给每个人(Public)或一个特定的身份列表(别名或组)。报告可以通过以下四个选项之一共享:
  • Full:用户可以查看、修改和保存对报告的更改。
  • 只读:报表可供用户查看，用户可以添加或删除过滤器，修改现有过滤器的值。用户还可以修改(设计)报告，但不能更改原始设计，但可以使用另存为创建副本。
  • View Only:用户可以查看报表，但不能对报表进行任何修改或保存更改。
  • Locked:报告可供用户查看，用户可以修改现有的过滤器的值，但用户不能添加或删除或更改过滤器或字段或保存更改到报告。

property.en: Gauge. Gauges can be used to highlight a specific metric. Select the property name and corresponding value. You may then apply the available styling and formatting.
property.zc: < p > < >强计。仪表可以用来突出一个特定的指标。选择属性名称和对应的值。然后，您可以应用可用的样式和格式
